sentences.sContent: Many forms of cancer can be cured if detected early.
sentences.sCn: 如果发现得早，许多种癌症都可以治愈。

sentences.sContent: ...Dogs may have learned to detect threat signs from humans and respond by trying to make peace...

remMethod.val: de(去掉) ＋ tect(遮盖) → 去除遮盖 → 发现， 察觉

words.tran: 侦查，探测；发觉，发现；察觉

trans.tranOther: to notice or discover something, especially something that is not easy to see, hear etc
